description: Here is the ImDisk Toolkit. This tool will let you mount image files of hard drive, cd-rom or floppy, and create one or several RamDisks with various parameters.
summary:
Requirements:
Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 or 10 (32 or 64 bits).
Some image file formats also require .NET Framework 4 (included in Windows 8 and later) to be mounted with the DiscUtils library.
author: LTR Data, Olof Lagerkvist, v77
